txt.en: You have collected many splendid-looking seashells from the beaches of Furtherholm. You should bring them to Dar么ma inside The Cracked Flagon to receive your reward.

'There is a thing I have been wanting to do but never seem to have the time. It is not unusual for beautiful seashells to be found on the island's northern shores. I wanted to take a break and collect some of them to decorate the cabins, but my duties have kept me from enjoying the beaches.

'If you bring me some beautiful seashells from Furtherholm's beaches, I would happily pay you for them. The best place to find seashells is on the island's north side, specifically in and around the channel there.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
'Oh, these are handsome shells indeed! They will do quite well, [placeholder], thank you.'
Dar么ma wants seashells from the nearby beaches to decorate the inn.
TBD\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
Dar么ma has offered to pay you for bringing seashells to her. She suggested looking on the island's northern shores, particularly in and around the channel.
